text: ESO 325-G004 is a giant elliptical galaxy which is located about 416 million light years away in the constellation of Centaurus. The galaxy also is located in a galaxy cluster known as Abell S740 in the same constellation. The galaxy has an apparent magnitude of 13.89. It only has one another designation which is "2MASX J13433318-3810336". == References == Category:Elliptical galaxies
title: ESO 325-G004
